JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_SKILL_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_SKILL_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_LANGUAGE_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_LANGUAGE_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOM_SKILL_ACTIVE_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOM_SKILL_ACTIVE_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_SKILL_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_SKILL_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_LANGUAGE_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_LANGUAGE_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOMMENDED_SKILLS_SAVE_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOMMENDED_SKILLS_SAVE_HANDLER";export var JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_SEARCH_SAVE_SKILL_TITLE_HANDLER="JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_SEARCH_SAVE_SKILL_TITLE_HANDLER";export var textFieldChangeHandler=function textFieldChangeHandler(name,value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_TEXT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value,key:name});};};export var saveUpdatedSkillTitle=function saveUpdatedSkillTitle(value){return function(dispatch){var data=value.map(function(item){return{id:item._id,value:item.title,label:item.title};});dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_SEARCH_SAVE_SKILL_TITLE_HANDLER,payload:data,key:"skillsField"});};};export var selectFieldChangeHandler=function selectFieldChangeHandler(name,value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_SELECT_CHANGE_HANDLER,payload:value,key:name});};};export var submitSkillFormHandler=function submitSkillFormHandler(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_SKILL_HANDLER,payload:value});};};export var recommendedSkillActiveHandler=function recommendedSkillActiveHandler(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOM_SKILL_ACTIVE_HANDLER,payload:value});dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ADD_NEW_SKILL_HANDLER,payload:value});};};export var removeSkillHandler=function removeSkillHandler(value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_SKILL_HANDLER,payload:value});};};export var removeLanguageHandler=function fetchDataIfNeeded(value){return function(dispatch){var data=value;var skillsData=data.skills?data.skills.map(function(item){return{id:item._id,title:item.title,level:item.level,importance:item.importance};}):[];//save lanauges 
dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_RECOMMENDED_SKILLS_SAVE_HANDLER,payload:skillsData});dispatch({type:JD_ADDITIONAL_INFO_REMOVE_LANGUAGE_HANDLER,payload:value});};};
